msbt.message: I had a gut feeling you were an art lover like me, !And I plan to reward my gut for its accuracy with some sort of sugary baked good. In the meantime, I wonder what other interests you and I share?

So, , I'm curious. Do you have a favorite work of art?Whenever I find a new piece that I love, I quickly become obsessed.Sometimes I'll just stare at it for hours and hoursand hours.I'm sorry What were we talking about, ?
I'm grateful to have company while I putter around this exhibit.I'd love to hear your thoughts on some of these pieces.
A fellow art enthusiast, I see. Let me guessâ€”you count the paint strokes in every painting too. It takes one to know one.
We're rather proud of our museum here on .We have a fabulous collection, , if I do say so myself.

I've noticed there's something of an aura surrounding the artwork displayed on this island. Visitors and residents are simply drawn to it.Of course, that could be because there's not much else to do on a deserted island like this.

As soon as I heard about the art gallery opening, I ran straight over.I've always pictured myself as a very sophisticated who spent her evenings in galleries and weekends reading on her yacht. All I need now is the boat!
Have you had a good look at everything yet, ?I think I'll stick around here a little while longer to soak up the artistic atmosphere, .
Can you believe that has a museum with a bonafide art gallery? And that it's open 24 hours!If Blathers served pancakes and egg creams, this place would quickly become my home away from home!
